channel.title: Remove modulation from a paramenter completely
channel.description: Hey! I want to remove a modulation from a parameter on a dial, so the "M" icon disappears completely, but can't. When moving the slider to 0, the next time I open it it stays on 1 and the modulation is still assigned. How can I remove the modulation from a parameter without replacing the whole object? Thanks!

item.title: Remove modulation from a paramenter completely
item.dc:creator: @bacha
item.description:
@bacha wrote:

Hey! I want to remove a modulation from a parameter on a dial, so the "M" icon disappears completely, but can't. When moving the slider to 0, the next time I open it it stays on 1 and the modulation is still assigned.

How can I remove the modulation from a parameter without replacing the whole object?

Thanks!
